name: BoxBet
description: BoxBet is redefining crypto iGaming with a mobile-first platform, supported by tier-one investors like CMCC. Central to BoxBet is BXBT, a deflationary ERC20 token fairly launched on Uniswap. BoxBet commits a portion of its revenue to continuously buy and burn BXBT tokens until only 25% of the total supply remains, ensuring sustained value appreciation and rewarding loyal players.
